thread.title: Another hitchhiker raped by three women in BMW
thread.title_full: Another hitchhiker raped by three women in BMW | News24

author: news24.com
title: Another hitchhiker raped by three women in BMW
text:
Phalaborwa - A Hazyview hitchhiker was allegedly raped by the three women who gave him a lift in their BMW, the fifth such incident to be reported on in the past few years.
Police in Phalaborwa, Limpopo, warned residents not to hitchhike after a man was raped this week, a News24 Correspondent reported.
The 31-year-old man from Hazyview told police he was hitchhiking between Phalaborwa and Hoedspruit on Monday when three women in a BMW 320i gave him a lift but then raped him.
Phalaborwa police spokesperson Constable Elvis Mongwe said one of the women offered the hitchhiker a soft drink. "Three minutes after drinking it, he had a painful erection."
